newsitem.title: USA: Morgan Stanley names investment group head.
newsitem.headline: Morgan Stanley names investment group head.

text.p: Morgan Stanley Group said Tuesday that David Darst has joined the firm as a managing director with responsibilities for The Investment Group, a new joint venture between Morgan Stanley Private Client Services and Morgan stanley Asset Management.

The investment group develops investment and portfolio strategies, implements asset allocation recommendations and creates new products for substantial private investors worldwide, a statement from Morgan Stanley said.
Darst served most recently as vice president and chief financial officer of the equities division of Goldman, Sachs & Co.
